input.sentences: the streets were busy with people !
people loved to shop the streets at night .
vendors had all of their items on display and ready for purchase .
the street was filled with packed vendors up and down the sidewalk .

output.sentences: The streets were packed with people, busy as the sun left the sky.
The streets may have been packed, but my dad's shop was void of people.
Street vendors were ready for each purchase made by those who avoided dad's shop.
The vendors were located up and down the street, just off of the sidewalk.
People came from all around to shop all night and have fun.
